13.title: The hallway

131.content:
"Hey kids!" yelled out Mr. Collier, the English literature teacher. There were three girls in the hallway: Gabrielle, Julia and Alex. They were all 7th graders who took Mr. Collier's class. Gabrielle was a 12 year old blonde girl, with her hair loose and flowing at butt length. She was rather short and underdeveloped, many confused her for being 10 years old. She was rather snarky and never in a good mood. Her friends called her Gab. Julia was very similar to Gabrielle physically but nearly the opposite in personality. A 12 year old blonde girl, she had her hair tied up in long twintails and usually wore cat ears on her head. Where Gab's voice could sound rough or coarse, Julia's always sounded energetic and innocent. Lastly, Alex was a 13 year old brunette who seemed older than she truly was. She had well-developed D-cup breasts. Her hair was a bit longer than shoulder length. Alex was rather moody, she could be in a great and energetic mood or she could storm off in a psychotic rage. Right now she was in a rather good mood... at least, until she saw Mr. Collier. No one at the school liked him. He clearly had a rather poor grasp on the English language, assigned difficult work without properly explaining what the objective was and in general proved to be a challenging and somewhat creepy person to even talk to. Right now he was approaching the tree girls.

"Girls, did you study for tomorrow's test? I made it rather tough." he commented while donning a smug smile and straightening out the cuffs of his jacket.

"Yes, Mr. Collier!" answered Julia. She was about the only person at the school who tolerated him. Her pink cardigan with a smiling flower perfectly reflected her mood.

"Well, I'm sorry to say that you wasted your time. You're not taking the test tomorrow!" The girls looked at him inquiringly as he said this.

"You postponed it?" asked Alex, not expecting this turn of events. Mr. Collier had never postponed a test before, not even when he hadn't finished covering the material for the test.

"Oh, heck no. Test is still on tomorrow. Just you girls won't be taking it."

"Why?" asked Gabrielle in a suspicious way.

"Why? Because the three of you are becoming my sex slaves!" said the teacher matter-of-factly.

"What the fuck are you on?" asked Gabrielle. She dug around the pockets of her gray sweatshirt and her torn jeans for her pepper spray.

Mr. Collier laughed and discretely pulled out a gun from his jacket, shooting Gabrielle in her left leg. Gabrielle collapsed on the floor, her pepper spray shattering due to the bullet and getting all over her wound, making it feel as though she dipped it in lava.

"Mr Collier?" Julia froze. Alex began dialing 911 when Mr. Collier aimed the gun at her.

"Alex, sweetie, put the phone down. I'm gonna carry Gabrielle, you and Julia be good girls and clean up the blood on the floor." he said calmly as if he were just talking about the weather.

"HELP! SOMEONE HELP!" Alex yelled. It was futile, they stuck around talking while everyone else left the school. It was rather late.

"Go ahead and keep yelling..." said Mr. Collier, lowering the gun, "...but if the blood hasn't been cleaned in 5 minutes, Gabrielle dies." he finished, pointing the gun at Gabrielle's head. Alex briefly assessed the situation and decided to play along for the moment. She took off her purple top to mop up the blood. Before she could start clenaing, Mr. Collier interrupted. "No, wait. Clean it up with your tongues."

Alex reluctantly began licking the pool of blood. Julia just stood there crying.

"Don't be a bitch, help your friend." said Mr. Collier, aiming his gun at Julia. Julia sobbed as she knelt down and started licking, her tears dropping to the floor and helping the blood come off. A few minutes later, the blood was cleaned up.

"Good... now, follow me to my car. Try anything funny and you're all stuffed with my cum and in a shallow grave at the abandoned pet graveyard within the next 6 hours.

The two able-bodied girls obeyed, as Mr. Collier carried the unconscious Gabrielle over his shoulder. Once they were all safely in the car, the teacher calmly drove over to his house. Once there, he quickly forced the girls inside. Before Alex and Julia could think of what to do next, Mr. Collier knocked the two of them out. He dragged all three girls down to his cellar, which he had fashioned into a torture room. A few hours later, the girls came to.
